entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalidate() does not invoke Draw() when GraphicsView is inside a Grid. #12560
  • MauiImage resource as stream missing #12556
  • App crashes when navigating after the app has been in the background #12553
  • CSS styles are ignored when element's IsEnabled=false on initialization #12550
  • Unable to Build and Debug Android #12549
  • VerticalScrollbar not showing when scrollview is added to the child of contentview #12547
    Backlog
  • Investigate a way to detect bumps of assemblies that are also in VS #12546
    Backlog
  • Shell Flyout causes application crash on launch if ShellContent is not the first item #12543
    Backlog
  • Heading not read out by screenreader on Android #12540
    Backlog
  • Can't use Entity Framework Core in iOS Release builds #12537
  • CollectionView.EmptyView does not display unless CollectionView placed within RefreshView #12535
    Backlog
  • Transparent background support in (blazor)webview component #12534

Closed

  • Entry properties CursorPosition and SelectionLength are not updated #7867
  • Label WordWrap does not work inside HorizontalStackLayout or StackLayout with horizontal orientation #10917
    Backlog
  • [Android] Crash using Bindable HorizontalStackLayout #4016
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] [iOS] ScrollView is not longer visualised when placed inside VerticalStackLayout #8645
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • CheckBox control Color property not rendering correctly #9404
    Backlog
  • Add a NuGet packed to a project. for Android #11118
  • The bug WMC100 #11076
  • PushModelAsync and Shell GoToAsync is not working in .NET MAUI android while we are navigating to Tabbed page from content page #12541
  • Can't build class Library in release mode - error NETSDK1094 #12548
  • If you could I do like to ask you to give it a bit more thought. Are you using this today with another control? What properties would you like to see to influence the clustering behavior? How do you like annotations to work? #12544
  • Shell Flyout causes application crash on launch if ShellContent is not the first item #12542
  • [MacCatalyst] `Authorization.ExecuteWithPrivileges` returns -60031 #12409
  • Button Text wrap #9102

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable nullable on Controls.Core #12555
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Avoid to update Shell Toolbar colors if already disposed the Tracker #12539
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢
  • Correctly propagate BindingContext in all ContentView scenarios #12536
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>

Merged

  • Revert "Disable WinUI optional extras by default" #12559
  • Revert "[net7.0] Disable WinUI optional extras by default" #12558
  • Revert "[release/7.0.1xx-sr2] Disable WinUI optional extras by default" #12557
  • Update Essentials Vibration API Docs #12529
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • Disable WinUI optional extras by default #12530
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.1xx-sr2] Disable WinUI optional extras by default #12552
  • [net7.0] Disable WinUI optional extras by default #12551
  • Notify CheckBox Foreground update after Color changed (alternative) #12102
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • Update Essentials PhoneDialer API Docs #12253
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Compass API Docs #11414
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Map API Docs #11936
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Merge main to net8.0 #12521
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] ItemsViewController add `_measurementCells` null checks #12518
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃

Updated

  • Propagate VisualElement.IsEnabled to children #12488
  • Update Essentials VersionTracking API Docs #12528
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • Micro benchmark fixes #12178
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Add more logging for BlazorWebView #12357
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Generate everything splash related in the splash target #12481
    area/single project ☝️
  • [Android] Fix clipped text in SwipeItem under some DPIs #11931
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending changes in Android AlertManager #11989
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [net7.0] Use older versions to match msbuild in VS #12472
    area/single project ☝️
  • [Housekeeping] Alternative to #11795 #12134
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #12157
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, platform/tizen
  • Add a null-guard in MenuItem to prevent NRE #12207
    t/bug, area/desktop 🖥️
  • [Essentials] add Bluetooth permissions #12413
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
